"""make sure properties work as expected"""
class DummyApplication(p_cli.ProsperApplication):
    PROGNAME = 'DUMMY'
    VERSION = '0.0.0'
    here_path = HERE
    config_path = LOCAL_CONFIG_PATH

    def main(self):
        return 'yes'
dummy = DummyApplication(__file__)
assert isinstance(dummy.config, p_config.ProsperConfig)
